title: "DHS S&T Awards Funds to Arlington, Mass., Startup Developing Anomaly Detection Systems for Securing Soft Targets"
excerpt: "Science and Technology Directorate (S&T) announced a Phase 1 Other Transaction award of $198,000 to Lauretta AI, a company based in Arlington, MA, to customize its commercial artificial intelligence solution and create an adaptable anomaly detection system to secure soft targets."
